DOC.brief_summary: To enable investigation fetal movement , researcher develop multichannel ultrasound pulse Doppler call ACTIFOETUS . This new fetal monitor include three transducer four sensor place three different zone mother 's abdomen . One transducer aim fetal heart , another low limb one transducer thorax fetal upper limb detect heart body movement . The signal analyse process software compute number parameter describe movement . Ninety pregnant woman 28 week gestation monitor 40 minute period every month every 2 week case pathological pregnancy . The final purpose develop system home monitoring indicator fetal well-being .
DOC.brief_title: Study Fetal Movements Using Multichannel Ultrasound Pulsed Doppler Normal Pathologic Pregnancy
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective study detect quantitative qualitative disorder fetal movement 28 week amenorrhea fetus present fetal distress . The fetal rhythm record 24 hour correlation maternal fetal movement study . Specific measure : - The fetal heart rate - The number extent fetal movement
DOC.criteria: 18 year age old Pregnancy singleton Woman 28 week amenorrhea Fetal malformation
DOC.keyword: Parameters fetal distress ( umbilical cerebral Doppler ) new-born parameter .
